item.title: Kubernetes Operator to manage rate limit istio configurations
item.description: Wouldn’t it be great to have an easy way to dynamically, via istio, limit the traffic to a service in Kubernetes? Figure out you have one or more ingress gateways for the incoming requests, and you want to limit the requests from a single IP, or to limit requests with an specific http header in an specific amount of time. With this operator you just have to create and deploy a simple Custom Resource (CR) with your desired rate limit configuration.
